dcterms:title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World (Film)
dcterms:creator: Edgar Wright (director)
dcterms:contributor: Bryan Lee O'Malley (based on the graphic novels); Michael Bacall (screenplay)
dcterms:subject: Action; Comedy; Fantasy; Romance; Canadian cinema
dcterms:description: 2010 feature film adaptation of Bryan Lee O'Malley's Scott Pilgrim graphic novels, directed by Edgar Wright and starring Michael Cera as Scott Pilgrim. The story follows Scott as he battles Ramona Flowers' seven evil exes in a video game-inspired Toronto, including a key fight at Casa Loma.
dcterms:rights: Copyright Universal Pictures and associated production companies
dctermsisDerivativeOf: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World (screenplay); Scott Pilgrim vs. the World: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack
